title: AAQ: Can Only Full-Time Devotees Become fully Krishna Conscious? | HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: No matter what condition we are in, we can become Krishna conscious.
segments.summary: The speaker addresses the question of whether only full-time devotees can achieve Krishna consciousness, arguing that it's possible regardless of one's material circumstances, using Bhaktivinoda Thakur as an example.

segments.key_quote: Whatever we do, we have to surrender to Krishna.
segments.summary: The speaker quotes the Bhagavad Gita, emphasizing the importance of surrendering all activities to Krishna, regardless of one's material status or engagement, as activity is inherent to the soul.

segments.key_quote: When we start attributing the result to ourselves, then you are on the material platform.
segments.summary: The speaker explains that while activity is essential, attributing the results of actions to oneself keeps one on the material platform, and receiving the mercy of Guru and Krishna is what truly matters for liberation.

segments.key_quote: It is the consciousness of that individual which determines whether it goes back to Godhead or not.
segments.summary: The speaker concludes that while being a full-time devotee is conducive to Krishna consciousness, ultimately it is one's consciousness and surrender to Krishna that determines whether one returns to Godhead.
